website_summaries.verdict: Neoprene 6-pack holder with comfortable handle, available in 9 super-vibrant patterns.
pros: Stretchy and durable neoprene 6-Pack carrier holds and insulates 6 cans or 12-20-oz
Comfortable grip, and flattens for compactness when not in use
Versatile, use for all kinds of occasions where you want or need beverages
cons: The neoprene stretches to accommodate containers, but some larger bottles or cans still won't fit adequately

customer_reviews.title: Keeps them cool for the 30 minute ride in the car each ...
customer_reviews.text: We use this tote to bring our baby's bottles to and from daycare. We use Dr. Brown's 8 oz. bottles and they are a snug fit. Probably wouldn't be able to fit any fatter bottles in here. Keeps them cool for the 30 minute ride in the car each way. Easy to carry. I get lots of complements on it from other parents and daycare staff.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love! The colors & design are prettier in person even. Fits normal size bottles/containers. I purchased these as a part of a gift and I may have to purchase another for myself. It's a great item to have for a day family picnic or camping or really any outing. Comfortable to grip/carry.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Fits water bottles, glass bottles and/or cans, or a mix of all 3. I bought it to prevent cans from rubbing together in the cooler while driving my ATV.
customer_reviews.author: JVReview

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not for Grolsch.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this specifically to transport homebrew in Grolsch swing top bottles. Unfortunately, they are slightly too big to fit in the sleeve. Works fine for run of the mill standard beer bottles.
customer_reviews.author: HappyCampers

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This will do exactly what I need it to do! I will be using this to cut down friction between glass bottles. Total bonus it will help keep them cool too!
customer_reviews.author: C C

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: The smell of neoprene and oil was horrible had to air it out on the clothes line but, is what I wanted. Could have been just a bit larger... Snug
customer_reviews.author: Susan DeClario

customer_reviews.title: Fine product, no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for dr Browns baby bottles- the standard narrow ones. The wide mouth ones don’t fit. Works perfectly for transporting bottles to daycare. Someday maybe it will be used for beer instead :) Neoprene is a little smelly at first, so I don’t leave the bottles in it for long. The odor seems to be dissipating.
customer_reviews.author: fahren

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: This was to small. I couldn't find bottles or cans that I would be carrying that would fit into the case
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great for carrying baby bottles!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I use it to carry bottles to and from work. This is a must have for a working pumping mama! Pretty color too.
customer_reviews.author: BKL

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: It didn't hold the bottles that i specifically ordered it for (20 oz glass bottles). However, it works well for water bottles and cans.
customer_reviews.author: Deidre B.

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and durable
customer_reviews.text: Product works well and keeps beverage cold for long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner. The product was as expected. Thick, sturdy material and well-made. Colors and design were true to the images advertised.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY L SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Buy This!
customer_reviews.text: I love this 6 pack carrier. The pattern is fun. The carrier keeps beer chilled while travelling to BYOB restaurants. Much classier than bringing your brews in a cardboard sixpack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas gift for me son. He loved the gift and took it back to college with him
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Scheff

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this looser carrier!! Great quality and love the print
customer_reviews.author: MADISON MORT

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them. Uses it for baby bottles ..
customer_reviews.author: melissa F.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't keep drinks very cold, but its convenient, and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: migman

customer_reviews.title: I love the color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color! It's a little tight to fit 6 waters. Once I put 2 water bottles in I had to squeeze a 3rd. I'm not sure I could fit 6 in there. But so far it does keep them cold.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Bustamante

customer_reviews.title: Great product-love the pattern!
customer_reviews.text: Great product--love the pattern! My initial order arrived with a small defect on the inside; the seller immediately offered a replacement--great customer service! I have three little ones, and don't like to lug around bags when we're on the move. Now when we go somewhere active (the park or a soccer game, for example), this is perfect for carrying water bottles, the baby's bottle, even had space to drop my keys in. I also use it for daycare (where multiple bottles are required during the week). Folds up and fits in a drawer when not being used.
customer_reviews.author: KS710

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to fit bottles in.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, fabric is nice. Soooo snug fitting it is a pain in the butt to use for anything but slim fit bottles. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: 6-Pack Carrier is Great for Other Things Besides Beer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Koverz 6-pack carrier for when I purchase my favorite ice tea, which comes in individual glass bottles. It is so inconvenient to have these bottles put into plastic bags! Depending on the store, some will wrap them individually or some just put them all in a bag. You have to keep your fingers crossed and hope they will not break before you get home. Now, with this carrier, my problem will be solved. I already did a fit test and the bottles will fit just fine. Yep, I like this!
customer_reviews.author: Reta R.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality but Narrow Sleeves
customer_reviews.text: Cute neoprene carrier just didn't work for my needs. My sister in law makes homemade kombucha and we saved up a bunch of GTs bottles (a brand) thinking we could make a 6 pack and use this for transporting them back and forth. Unfortunately the bottle sleeves were too narrow and not even on bottle would fit in. I don't even think they would fit a beer bkttle.
customer_reviews.author: E. Schey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the price. I often have drinks and dont need a large cooler. This is a great solution and its really cool looking. I got the green fishing one.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great price and very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Really nicely made, keeps drinks cold and my wife likes the pattern
customer_reviews.author: LevitMan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for it’s purpose! It is very tight and sometimes hard to get bottles slightly bigger than a water bottle in it but I think with time it will stretch out. I would rather it have the elasticity in it than it be too lose!!
customer_reviews.author: mikayla sowa

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This was a bit too small for my Otis 18oz bottles but the product itself is very nice. Hopefully it will stretch a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Letitia

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Will be great for all outdoor activities. I tried a bottle of water and a bottle of beer...both fit perfect in each compartment. This is a well made item!
customer_reviews.author: IcanSeeYou2

customer_reviews.title: Such a cool thing to have for so many occasions !!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet but cannot wait to, its really pretty and feminine to boot.
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: Nice product and love the look
customer_reviews.text: Scored well with this as a Christmas gift for our son-in-law. Loves hunting and loves beer... not at the same time fortunately. It's a little tight for bottles, but they do fit with a little pressure. Might stretch a bit after time.
customer_reviews.author: K. C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Keeps my water & pop cold for hrs!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a gift. It came on time and looked like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift and it was really fun and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Baskette

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hold a bottle of water near that size. Only fits glass bottles. Not very usable. Smells bad
customer_reviews.author: rpmom

customer_reviews.title: Well made and so useful
customer_reviews.text: I received the flower print as a gift and loved it so much that I purchased the camo print for my brother in-law. Awesome gift!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great Insulator!
customer_reviews.text: This carrier works well for cans and bottles because of the stretchable fabric, is very well made, looks great and keeps drinks cold for hours on a picnic, the boat or in the car.
customer_reviews.author: mistrbill

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: These are very well made providing a snug fit and neoprene thicker than others I have seen.... hopefully offering more protection during transport!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Weems

product_meta.title: Koverz - #1 Neoprene Insulated 6-Pack Carrier, Beer Bottle Carrier, Six-Pack Tote - Midnight Mums
product_meta.description: Color:Midnight MumsOur Koverz Neoprene 6-Pack Carriers are made of thick neoprene to keep your favorite beverages protected and cold! Perfect for Tailgating! Take your favorite beers with you or mix and match with water bottles or other bottles/cans. Machine Washable.
feature_bullets: This stretchy neoprene 6-Pack Carrier holds, protects and keeps (6) 12-20-oz bottles or cans cold
Durable Neoprene is Strong yet Soft for a comfortable grip when in use
Perfect for Tailgating, Picnics, The Beach or other Social Gatherings!
Available in many Styles for Men & Women

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars95 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
